word:
The Genesis of Movements Toward Consolidation, Confederacies, 
                       Trade Unions and Secret Societies 


     [Six weeks after the General Conference session at which Ellen White called for the moving of our institutions away from Battle Creek, she again made reference to the destruction of the institutions at Battle Creek and 


                                    -84- 

makes mention of trade unions, as she traces back to its source the development of confederacies.]
